Lyric:
[00:03.14]I must be dreaming tonight.

[00:20.24]
[00:25.00]How can I protect you forever?
[00:30.32]Close your eyes
[00:32.58]I’ll be anything for you

[00:41.01]Without you by my side..
[00:45.83]「I’ll believe..」
[00:49.26]
[00:50.40]Right now the real world is black out.
[00:52.28]it’s black out
